description: Experience the vibrant colors, lights, and cultural performances during the celebration of the Hindu festival of lights.
Join the world's biggest carnival for a dazzling display of samba parades, music, and vibrant costumes, celebrating Brazilian culture.
Witness the breathtaking beauty of cherry blossoms during Hanami, a traditional Japanese custom of enjoying the transient beauty of flowers.
Embrace the Bavarian culture with traditional music, dance, and, of course, a wide variety of beer during the world-famous Oktoberfest.
Experience the lively atmosphere of Mardi Gras with colorful parades, jazz music, and festive masks, marking the culmination of the carnival season.
